title: Roku’s New Box Will Stream 4K and Find Your Remote
text:
Roku’s New Box Will Stream 4K and Find Your Remote 
Published By: Wired.com - Today 
The Roku 4 will stream Ultra HD video at up to 60fps. Perhaps more importantly, it'll help you find 4K things to watch. The post Roku’s Ne...
